cw721_base_code_id.description:
Code ID of cw721-ics contract. A new cw721-ics will be instantiated for each new IBCd NFT classID.

NOTE: this _must_ correspond to the cw721-base contract. Using a regular cw721 may cause the ICS 721 interface implemented by this contract to stop working, and IBCd away NFTs to be unreturnable as cw721 does not have a mint method in the spec.

pauser.description: Address that may pause the contract. PAUSER may pause the contract a single time; in pausing the contract they burn the right to do so again. A new pauser may be later nominated by the CosmWasm level admin via a migration.

proxy.description: An optional proxy contract. If a proxy is set the contract will only accept NFTs from that proxy. The proxy is expected to implement the cw721 proxy interface defined in the cw721-proxy crate.

Binary.description:
Binary is a wrapper around Vec<u8> to add base64 de/serialization with serde. It also adds some helper methods to help encode inline.

This is only needed as serde-json-{core,wasm} has a horrible encoding for Vec<u8>. See also <https://github.com/CosmWasm/cosmwasm/blob/main/docs/MESSAGE_TYPES.md>.
